            /* 1. DEFINE THE FADE ANIMATION MANUALLY */
            @keyframes force-fade-ping {
                0% {
                    transform: scale(1);
                    opacity: 0.75; /* Start visible */
                }
                75%, 100% {
                    transform: scale(2);
                    opacity: 0; /* Fade to nothing */
                }
            }

            /* 2. CLASS TO KILL BOOTSTRAP TRANSITIONS */
            .no-transition {
                transition: none !important;
                -webkit-transition: none !important;
            }
        </style>
